title: Gone (ice) fishing
caption: Ice fishing in the Land of 10,000 Lakes
desc: The Ice Fishing Extravaganza on Gull Lake, Minnesota, certainly reels in the crowds to this part of the US in late January. More than 10,000 people will try to catch as many fish as they can, mostly walleye and northern pike, in a charitable contest organised and run by volunteers.
copyright: People ice fishing on Gull Lake in Brainerd, Minnesota, USA (Â© Robert Benson/Cavan)
